io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.http

Class OpenTracingClientFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.http.AbstractOpenTracingFilter
      • io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.http.OpenTracingClientFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ordered, HttpClientFilter, HttpFilter

    @Filter(value="${tracing.http.client.path:/**}")
 @Requires(beans=io.opentracing.Tracer.class) @Requires(missingBeans=io.opentracing.noop.NoopTracer.class) @Requires(missingBeans=BraveTracingClientFilter.class)
public class OpenTracingClientFilter
extends AbstractOpenTracingFilter
implements HttpClientFilter
    An HTTP client instrumentation filter that uses Open Tracing.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
